nodes.documentation:
@title Escrow_V3
@dev Escrow_V3 is the latest version of the escrow contract, currently being used for production
nodes.name: Escrow_V3

nodes.documentation: @dev Restricts the access to a given function to the dApp admin only
nodes.name: onlyDAppAdmin

nodes.documentation: @dev Checks whether the nonce in the authorisation signature was already used. Prevents replay attacks.
nodes.name: preValidateFund

nodes.documentation: @dev The token address and the dappadmin are set on contract creation

nodes.name: fundForRelayedPayment
fundForFiatPayment

nodes.documentation: @dev Recovers the signer and checks whether the person that signed the signature is whitelisted as `signer`. Marks the nonce as used
nodes.name: _preFund

nodes.documentation: @dev performs EC recover on the signature
nodes.name: getSigner

nodes.documentation: @dev refunds the msg sender for the transaction costs
nodes.name: _refundMsgSender

nodes.documentation: @dev withdraws the ethers in the escrow contract. Performed only by the dAppAdmin
nodes.name: withdrawEthers

nodes.documentation: @dev withdraws the tokens in the escrow contract. Performed only by the dAppAdmin
nodes.name: withdrawTokens

nodes.documentation: @dev marks a given address as signer or not, depending on the second bool parameter. Performed only by the dAppAdmin
nodes.name: editSigner

nodes.documentation: @dev changes the dAppAdmin of the contract. Performed only by the dAppAdmin
nodes.name: editDappAdmin
